words.source: H1571 conj. + adv. gam 'also, even'; KJV 'and I have also', ESV 'moreover', NASB 'furthermore'
H589 pron. 1cs ʾani 'I'; emphatic subject pronoun; KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'
H8085 Qal perf. 1cs of שָׁמַע 'to hear'; KJV 'have heard', ESV 'have heard', NASB 'have heard'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H5009 n.fs neʾaqah 'groaning, cry' in construct; KJV 'the groaning of', ESV 'the groaning of', NASB 'the groaning of'
H1121 n.mp bene 'sons, children' in construct; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'whom', ESV 'whom', NASB 'whom'
H4714 proper name Mitsrayim 'Egypt' (here used as gentilicic, 'Egyptians'); KJV 'the Egyptians', ESV 'the Egyptians', NASB 'the Egyptians'
H5647 Hiphil ptc. mp of עָבַד 'to work, serve; Hiphil: to compel to serve'; KJV 'keep in bondage', ESV 'hold as slaves', NASB 'are holding in bondage'
H853 DOM + 3mp suff.; KJV 'them', ESV 'them', NASB 'them'
H2142 wayyiqtol 1cs Qal of זָכַר 'to remember'; KJV 'have remembered', ESV 'I have remembered', NASB 'I have remembered'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H1285 n.fs berith 'covenant' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my covenant', ESV 'my covenant', NASB 'My covenant'
